name: 80's Racing Game
description:
This is a small racing game made for the Lost Cartridge Game Jam.
Therefor it is in a retro vibe inspired by the PS1.
You can drive around with WASD and try to beat your opponent in the red car.
But watch out he is a dangerous guy!



Additional Information for the game and anyone who is interested:

The only third party asset used in this game is the font in assets/.
It is made by GeelynEdits.

and is available on https://www.fontspace.com/pixelletters-font-f22954.

Three people were working on this:

T3V (https://github.com/tevoran)

enkhtuvshinj (https://github.com/enkhtuvshinj)

asmateus (https://github.com/asmateus)

The repository of this game is publicly available on

https://github.com/enkhtuvshinj/T3Vtech-3-template
